message:
I have implemented the `simpo_loss` method in `scripts/simpo_trainer.py` according to the reference in `golden_files/simpo_trainer_golden.py`. The method now computes chosen and rejected rewards, applies optional label smoothing, calculates the SimPO loss combining policy gap and KL regularization, and returns `(losses, chosen_rewards, rejected_rewards)`.

Please review the changes. Let me know if you’d like any adjustments!
